mapper.select:
select
from purchase_payables where pp_Yn=0 ORDER BY pp_id DESC

SELECT pp_id,pp_type,pp_number, pp_date, pp_pc_id,pp_pc_name,pp_team_id, pp_team_name,pp_buyer,pp_project_name, pp_currency,pp_exchange_rate,pp_payablesmain_price, pp_currentbalance,pp_discountamount,pp_amountcharged, pp_offsetamount,pp_auditing,pp_yn, pp_custom1,pp_custom2,pp_custom3, pp_custom4,pp_custom5,pp_custom6,pp_custom7,pp_custom8, pp_custom9,pp_custom10 FROM purchase_payables WHERE pp_custom8=#{ppCustom8,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pp_yn=0 ORDER BY pp_custom2 DESC

SELECT pp_id,pp_type,pp_number, pp_date, pp_pc_id,pp_pc_name,pp_team_id, pp_team_name,pp_buyer,pp_project_name, pp_currency,pp_exchange_rate,pp_payablesmain_price, pp_currentbalance,pp_discountamount,pp_amountcharged, pp_offsetamount,pp_auditing,pp_yn, pp_custom1,pp_custom2,pp_custom3, pp_custom4,pp_custom5,pp_custom6,pp_custom7,pp_custom8, pp_custom9,pp_custom10 FROM purchase_payables WHERE pp_pc_name=#{ppPcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pp_yn=0 AND pp_custom9 is null ORDER BY pp_custom2 DESC
